Package core.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cell
    This interface describes a cell of the Conway's Game of Life.
    CellEnvironment
    This interface must be implemented by classes which use two methods to determine if the cell should die or be born based on the number of neighbors.
    Environment
    This is the main environment for the generation.
    Generation
    An interface for a cell generation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CellEnvironmentImpl
    This class applies the pattern Strategy to implement CellEnvironment.
    EnvironmentFactory
    A factory used to create Environment.
    GenerationFactory
    Utility class for creation of Generation.
    Generations
    Utility class for computation of Generation.
    SimpleCell
    Implementation of the interface Cell.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StandardCellEnvironments
    Enumeration for common rule sets used in Conway's Game of Life.
    Status
    Status describes the current state of a Cell.
